00002 class _tree_struct {
00003     // Structure table and fields
00004     protected $table    = "";
00005     protected $fields   = array(
00006             "id"        => false,
00007             "parent_id" => false,
00008             "position"  => false,
00009             "left"      => false,
00010             "right"     => false,
00011             "level"     => false

00014     // Constructor
00015     function __construct($table = "tree", $fields = array()) {
00016         $this->table = $table;
00017         if(!count($fields)) {
00018             foreach($this->fields as $k => &$v) { $v = $k; }
00019         }
00020         else {
00021             foreach($fields as $key => $field) {
00022                 switch($key) {
00023                     case "id":
00024                     case "parent_id":
00025                     case "position":
00026                     case "left":
00027                     case "right":
00028                     case "level":
00029                         $this->fields[$key] = $field;
00030                         break;
00031                 }
00032             }
00033         }
00034         // Database
00035         $this->db = new _database;
00036     }

00038     function _get_node($id) {
00039         $this->db->query("SELECT `".implode("` , `", $this->fields)."` FROM `".$this->table."` WHERE `".$this->fields["id"]."` = ".(int) $id);
00040         $this->db->nextr();
00041         return $this->db->nf() === 0 ? false : $this->db->get_row("assoc");
00042     }
00043     function _get_children($id, $recursive = false) {
00044         $children = array();
00045         if($recursive) {
00046             $node = $this->_get_node($id);
00047             $this->db->query("SELECT `".implode("` , `", $this->fields)."` FROM `".$this->table."` WHERE `".$this->fields["left"]."` >= ".(int) $node[$this->fields["left"]]." AND `".$this->fields["right"]."` <= ".(int) $node[$this->fields["right"]]." ORDER BY `".$this->fields["left"]."` ASC");
00048         }
00049         else {
00050             $this->db->query("SELECT `".implode("` , `", $this->fields)."` FROM `".$this->table."` WHERE `".$this->fields["parent_id"]."` = ".(int) $id." ORDER BY `".$this->fields["position"]."` ASC");
00051         }
00052         while($this->db->nextr()) $children[$this->db->f($this->fields["id"])] = $this->db->get_row("assoc");
00053         return $children;
00054     }
00055     function _get_path($id) {
00056         $node = $this->_get_node($id);
00057         $path = array();
00058         if(!$node === false) return false;
00059         $this->db->query("SELECT `".implode("` , `", $this->fields)."` FROM `".$this->table."` WHERE `".$this->fields["left"]."` <= ".(int) $node[$this->fields["left"]]." AND `".$this->fields["right"]."` >= ".(int) $node[$this->fields["right"]]);
00060         while($this->db->nextr()) $path[$this->db->f($this->fields["id"])] = $this->db->get_row("assoc");
00061         return $path;
00062     }
00063 
00064     function _create($parent, $position) {
00065         return $this->_move(0, $parent, $position);
00066     }
00067     function _remove($id) {
00068         if((int)$id === 1) { return false; }
00069         $data = $this->_get_node($id);
00070         $lft = (int)$data[$this->fields["left"]];
00071         $rgt = (int)$data[$this->fields["right"]];
00072         $dif = $rgt - $lft + 1;
00073 
00074         // deleting node and its children
00075         $this->db->query("" . 
00076             "DELETE FROM `".$this->table."` " . 
00077             "WHERE `".$this->fields["left"]."` >= ".$lft." AND `".$this->fields["right"]."` <= ".$rgt
00078         );
00079         // shift left indexes of nodes right of the node
00080         $this->db->query("".
00081             "UPDATE `".$this->table."` " . 
00082                 "SET `".$this->fields["left"]."` = `".$this->fields["left"]."` - ".$dif." " . 
00083             "WHERE `".$this->fields["left"]."` > ".$rgt
00084         );
00085         // shift right indexes of nodes right of the node and the node's parents
00086         $this->db->query("" . 
00087             "UPDATE `".$this->table."` " . 
00088                 "SET `".$this->fields["right"]."` = `".$this->fields["right"]."` - ".$dif." " . 
00089             "WHERE `".$this->fields["right"]."` > ".$lft
00090         );
00091 
00092         $pid = (int)$data[$this->fields["parent_id"]];
00093         $pos = (int)$data[$this->fields["position"]];
00094 
00095         // Update position of siblings below the deleted node
00096         $this->db->query("" . 
00097             "UPDATE `".$this->table."` " . 
00098                 "SET `".$this->fields["position"]."` = `".$this->fields["position"]."` - 1 " . 
00099             "WHERE `".$this->fields["parent_id"]."` = ".$pid." AND `".$this->fields["position"]."` > ".$pos
00100         );
00101         return true;
00102     }
00103     function _move($id, $ref_id, $position = 0, $is_copy = false) {
00104         if((int)$ref_id === 0 || (int)$id === 1) { return false; }
00105         $sql        = array();                      // Queries executed at the end
00106         $node       = $this->_get_node($id);        // Node data
00107         $nchildren  = $this->_get_children($id);    // Node children
00108         $ref_node   = $this->_get_node($ref_id);    // Ref node data
00109         $rchildren  = $this->_get_children($ref_id);// Ref node children
00110 
00111         $ndif = 2;
00112         $node_ids = array(-1);
00113         if($node !== false) {
00114             $node_ids = array_keys($this->_get_children($id, true));
00115             // TODO: should be !$is_copy && , but if copied to self - screws some right indexes
00116             if(in_array($ref_id, $node_ids)) return false;
00117             $ndif = $node[$this->fields["right"]] - $node[$this->fields["left"]] + 1;
00118         }
00119         if($position >= count($rchildren)) {
00120             $position = count($rchildren);
00121         }
00122 
00123         // Not creating or copying - old parent is cleaned
00124         if($node !== false && $is_copy == false) {
00125             $sql[] = "" . 
00126                 "UPDATE `".$this->table."` " . 
00127                     "SET `".$this->fields["position"]."` = `".$this->fields["position"]."` - 1 " . 
00128                 "WHERE " . 
00129                     "`".$this->fields["parent_id"]."` = ".$node[$this->fields["parent_id"]]." AND " . 
00130                     "`".$this->fields["position"]."` > ".$node[$this->fields["position"]];
00131             $sql[] = "" . 
00132                 "UPDATE `".$this->table."` " . 
00133                     "SET `".$this->fields["left"]."` = `".$this->fields["left"]."` - ".$ndif." " . 
00134                 "WHERE `".$this->fields["left"]."` > ".$node[$this->fields["right"]];
00135             $sql[] = "" . 
00136                 "UPDATE `".$this->table."` " . 
00137                     "SET `".$this->fields["right"]."` = `".$this->fields["right"]."` - ".$ndif." " . 
00138                 "WHERE " . 
00139                     "`".$this->fields["right"]."` > ".$node[$this->fields["left"]]." AND " . 
00140                     "`".$this->fields["id"]."` NOT IN (".implode(",", $node_ids).") ";
00141         }
00142         // Preparing new parent
00143         $sql[] = "" . 
00144             "UPDATE `".$this->table."` " . 
00145                 "SET `".$this->fields["position"]."` = `".$this->fields["position"]."` + 1 " . 
00146             "WHERE " . 
00147                 "`".$this->fields["parent_id"]."` = ".$ref_id." AND " . 
00148                 "`".$this->fields["position"]."` >= ".$position." " . 
00149                 ( $is_copy ? "" : " AND `".$this->fields["id"]."` NOT IN (".implode(",", $node_ids).") ");
00150 
00151         $ref_ind = $ref_id === 0 ? (int)$rchildren[count($rchildren) - 1][$this->fields["right"]] + 1 : (int)$ref_node[$this->fields["right"]];
00152         $ref_ind = max($ref_ind, 1);
00153 
00154         $self = ($node !== false && !$is_copy && (int)$node[$this->fields["parent_id"]] == $ref_id && $position > $node[$this->fields["position"]]) ? 1 : 0;
00155         foreach($rchildren as $k => $v) {
00156             if($v[$this->fields["position"]] - $self == $position) {
00157                 $ref_ind = (int)$v[$this->fields["left"]];
00158                 break;
00159             }
00160         }
00161         if($node !== false && !$is_copy && $node[$this->fields["left"]] < $ref_ind) {
00162             $ref_ind -= $ndif;
00163         }
00164 
00165         $sql[] = "" . 
00166             "UPDATE `".$this->table."` " . 
00167                 "SET `".$this->fields["left"]."` = `".$this->fields["left"]."` + ".$ndif." " . 
00168             "WHERE " . 
00169                 "`".$this->fields["left"]."` >= ".$ref_ind." " . 
00170                 ( $is_copy ? "" : " AND `".$this->fields["id"]."` NOT IN (".implode(",", $node_ids).") ");
00171         $sql[] = "" . 
00172             "UPDATE `".$this->table."` " . 
00173                 "SET `".$this->fields["right"]."` = `".$this->fields["right"]."` + ".$ndif." " . 
00174             "WHERE " . 
00175                 "`".$this->fields["right"]."` >= ".$ref_ind." " . 
00176                 ( $is_copy ? "" : " AND `".$this->fields["id"]."` NOT IN (".implode(",", $node_ids).") ");
00177 
00178         $ldif = $ref_id == 0 ? 0 : $ref_node[$this->fields["level"]] + 1;
00179         $idif = $ref_ind;
00180         if($node !== false) {
00181             $ldif = $node[$this->fields["level"]] - ($ref_node[$this->fields["level"]] + 1);
00182             $idif = $node[$this->fields["left"]] - $ref_ind;
00183             if($is_copy) {
00184                 $sql[] = "" . 
00185                     "INSERT INTO `".$this->table."` (" . 
00186                         "`".$this->fields["parent_id"]."`, " . 
00187                         "`".$this->fields["position"]."`, " . 
00188                         "`".$this->fields["left"]."`, " . 
00189                         "`".$this->fields["right"]."`, " . 
00190                         "`".$this->fields["level"]."`" . 
00191                     ") " . 
00192                         "SELECT " . 
00193                             "".$ref_id.", " . 
00194                             "`".$this->fields["position"]."`, " . 
00195                             "`".$this->fields["left"]."` - (".($idif + ($node[$this->fields["left"]] >= $ref_ind ? $ndif : 0))."), " . 
00196                             "`".$this->fields["right"]."` - (".($idif + ($node[$this->fields["left"]] >= $ref_ind ? $ndif : 0))."), " . 
00197                             "`".$this->fields["level"]."` - (".$ldif.") " . 
00198                         "FROM `".$this->table."` " . 
00199                         "WHERE " . 
00200                             "`".$this->fields["id"]."` IN (".implode(",", $node_ids).") " . 
00201                         "ORDER BY `".$this->fields["level"]."` ASC";
00202             }
00203             else {
00204                 $sql[] = "" . 
00205                     "UPDATE `".$this->table."` SET " . 
00206                         "`".$this->fields["parent_id"]."` = ".$ref_id.", " . 
00207                         "`".$this->fields["position"]."` = ".$position." " . 
00208                     "WHERE " . 
00209                         "`".$this->fields["id"]."` = ".$id;
00210                 $sql[] = "" . 
00211                     "UPDATE `".$this->table."` SET " . 
00212                         "`".$this->fields["left"]."` = `".$this->fields["left"]."` - (".$idif."), " . 
00213                         "`".$this->fields["right"]."` = `".$this->fields["right"]."` - (".$idif."), " . 
00214                         "`".$this->fields["level"]."` = `".$this->fields["level"]."` - (".$ldif.") " . 
00215                     "WHERE " . 
00216                         "`".$this->fields["id"]."` IN (".implode(",", $node_ids).") ";
00217             }
00218         }
00219         else {
00220             $sql[] = "" . 
00221                 "INSERT INTO `".$this->table."` (" . 
00222                     "`".$this->fields["parent_id"]."`, " . 
00223                     "`".$this->fields["position"]."`, " . 
00224                     "`".$this->fields["left"]."`, " . 
00225                     "`".$this->fields["right"]."`, " . 
00226                     "`".$this->fields["level"]."` " . 
00227                     ") " . 
00228                 "VALUES (" . 
00229                     $ref_id.", " . 
00230                     $position.", " . 
00231                     $idif.", " . 
00232                     ($idif + 1).", " . 
00233                     $ldif. 
00234                 ")";
00235         }
00236         foreach($sql as $q) { $this->db->query($q); }
00237         $ind = $this->db->insert_id();
00238         if($is_copy) $this->_fix_copy($ind, $position);
00239         return $node === false || $is_copy ? $ind : true;
00240     }
00241     function _fix_copy($id, $position) {
00242         $node = $this->_get_node($id);
00243         $children = $this->_get_children($id, true);
00244 
00245         $map = array();
00246         for($i = $node[$this->fields["left"]] + 1; $i < $node[$this->fields["right"]]; $i++) {
00247             $map[$i] = $id;
00248         }
00249         foreach($children as $cid => $child) {
00250             if((int)$cid == (int)$id) {
00251                 $this->db->query("UPDATE `".$this->table."` SET `".$this->fields["position"]."` = ".$position." WHERE `".$this->fields["id"]."` = ".$cid);
00252                 continue;
00253             }
00254             $this->db->query("UPDATE `".$this->table."` SET `".$this->fields["parent_id"]."` = ".$map[(int)$child[$this->fields["left"]]]." WHERE `".$this->fields["id"]."` = ".$cid);
00255             for($i = $child[$this->fields["left"]] + 1; $i < $child[$this->fields["right"]]; $i++) {
00256                 $map[$i] = $cid;
00257             }
00258         }
00259     }

00261     function _reconstruct() {
00262         $this->db->query("" . 
00263             "CREATE TEMPORARY TABLE `temp_tree` (" . 
00264                 "`".$this->fields["id"]."` INTEGER NOT NULL, " . 
00265                 "`".$this->fields["parent_id"]."` INTEGER NOT NULL, " . 
00266                 "`". $this->fields["position"]."` INTEGER NOT NULL" . 
00267             ") type=HEAP"
00268         );
00269         $this->db->query("" . 
00270             "INSERT INTO `temp_tree` " . 
00271                 "SELECT " . 
00272                     "`".$this->fields["id"]."`, " . 
00273                     "`".$this->fields["parent_id"]."`, " . 
00274                     "`".$this->fields["position"]."` " . 
00275                 "FROM `".$this->table."`"
00276         );
00277 
00278         $this->db->query("" . 
00279             "CREATE TEMPORARY TABLE `temp_stack` (" . 
00280                 "`".$this->fields["id"]."` INTEGER NOT NULL, " . 
00281                 "`".$this->fields["left"]."` INTEGER, " . 
00282                 "`".$this->fields["right"]."` INTEGER, " . 
00283                 "`".$this->fields["level"]."` INTEGER, " . 
00284                 "`stack_top` INTEGER NOT NULL, " . 
00285                 "`".$this->fields["parent_id"]."` INTEGER, " . 
00286                 "`".$this->fields["position"]."` INTEGER " . 
00287             ") type=HEAP"
00288         );
00289         $counter = 2;
00290         $this->db->query("SELECT COUNT(*) FROM temp_tree");
00291         $this->db->nextr();
00292         $maxcounter = (int) $this->db->f(0) * 2;
00293         $currenttop = 1;
00294         $this->db->query("" . 
00295             "INSERT INTO `temp_stack` " . 
00296                 "SELECT " . 
00297                     "`".$this->fields["id"]."`, " . 
00298                     "1, " . 
00299                     "NULL, " . 
00300                     "0, " . 
00301                     "1, " . 
00302                     "`".$this->fields["parent_id"]."`, " . 
00303                     "`".$this->fields["position"]."` " . 
00304                 "FROM `temp_tree` " . 
00305                 "WHERE `".$this->fields["parent_id"]."` = 0"
00306         );
00307         $this->db->query("DELETE FROM `temp_tree` WHERE `".$this->fields["parent_id"]."` = 0");
00308 
00309         while ($counter <= $maxcounter) {
00310             $this->db->query("" . 
00311                 "SELECT " . 
00312                     "`temp_tree`.`".$this->fields["id"]."` AS tempmin, " . 
00313                     "`temp_tree`.`".$this->fields["parent_id"]."` AS pid, " . 
00314                     "`temp_tree`.`".$this->fields["position"]."` AS lid " . 
00315                 "FROM `temp_stack`, `temp_tree` " . 
00316                 "WHERE " . 
00317                     "`temp_stack`.`".$this->fields["id"]."` = `temp_tree`.`".$this->fields["parent_id"]."` AND " . 
00318                     "`temp_stack`.`stack_top` = ".$currenttop." " . 
00319                 "ORDER BY `temp_tree`.`".$this->fields["position"]."` ASC LIMIT 1"
00320             );
00321 
00322             if ($this->db->nextr()) {
00323                 $tmp = $this->db->f("tempmin");
00324 
00325                 $q = "INSERT INTO temp_stack (stack_top, `".$this->fields["id"]."`, `".$this->fields["left"]."`, `".$this->fields["right"]."`, `".$this->fields["level"]."`, `".$this->fields["parent_id"]."`, `".$this->fields["position"]."`) VALUES(".($currenttop + 1).", ".$tmp.", ".$counter.", NULL, ".$currenttop.", ".$this->db->f("pid").", ".$this->db->f("lid").")";
00326                 $this->db->query($q);
00327                 $this->db->query("DELETE FROM `temp_tree` WHERE `".$this->fields["id"]."` = ".$tmp);
00328                 $counter++;
00329                 $currenttop++;
00330             }
00331             else {
00332                 $this->db->query("" . 
00333                     "UPDATE temp_stack SET " . 
00334                         "`".$this->fields["right"]."` = ".$counter.", " . 
00335                         "`stack_top` = -`stack_top` " . 
00336                     "WHERE `stack_top` = ".$currenttop
00337                 );
00338                 $counter++;
00339                 $currenttop--;
00340             }
00341         }
00342 
00343         $temp_fields = $this->fields;
00344         unset($temp_fields["parent_id"]);
00345         unset($temp_fields["position"]);
00346         unset($temp_fields["left"]);
00347         unset($temp_fields["right"]);
00348         unset($temp_fields["level"]);
00349         if(count($temp_fields) > 1) {
00350             $this->db->query("" . 
00351                 "CREATE TEMPORARY TABLE `temp_tree2` " . 
00352                     "SELECT `".implode("`, `", $temp_fields)."` FROM `".$this->table."` "
00353             );
00354         }
00355         $this->db->query("TRUNCATE TABLE `".$this->table."`");
00356         $this->db->query("" . 
00357             "INSERT INTO ".$this->table." (" . 
00358                     "`".$this->fields["id"]."`, " . 
00359                     "`".$this->fields["parent_id"]."`, " . 
00360                     "`".$this->fields["position"]."`, " . 
00361                     "`".$this->fields["left"]."`, " . 
00362                     "`".$this->fields["right"]."`, " . 
00363                     "`".$this->fields["level"]."` " . 
00364                 ") " . 
00365                 "SELECT " . 
00366                     "`".$this->fields["id"]."`, " . 
00367                     "`".$this->fields["parent_id"]."`, " . 
00368                     "`".$this->fields["position"]."`, " . 
00369                     "`".$this->fields["left"]."`, " . 
00370                     "`".$this->fields["right"]."`, " . 
00371                     "`".$this->fields["level"]."` " . 
00372                 "FROM temp_stack " . 
00373                 "ORDER BY `".$this->fields["id"]."`"
00374         );
00375         if(count($temp_fields) > 1) {
00376             $sql = "" . 
00377                 "UPDATE `".$this->table."` v, `temp_tree2` SET v.`".$this->fields["id"]."` = v.`".$this->fields["id"]."` ";
00378             foreach($temp_fields as $k => $v) {
00379                 if($k == "id") continue;
00380                 $sql .= ", v.`".$v."` = `temp_tree2`.`".$v."` ";
00381             }
00382             $sql .= " WHERE v.`".$this->fields["id"]."` = `temp_tree2`.`".$this->fields["id"]."` ";
00383             $this->db->query($sql);
00384         }
00385     }

00387     function _analyze() {
00388         $report = array();
00389 
00390         $this->db->query("" . 
00391             "SELECT " . 
00392                 "`".$this->fields["left"]."` FROM `".$this->table."` s " . 
00393             "WHERE " . 
00394                 "`".$this->fields["parent_id"]."` = 0 "
00395         );
00396         $this->db->nextr();
00397         if($this->db->nf() == 0) {
00398             $report[] = "[FAIL]\tNo root node.";
00399         }
00400         else {
00401             $report[] = ($this->db->nf() > 1) ? "[FAIL]\tMore than one root node." : "[OK]\tJust one root node.";
00402         }
00403         $report[] = ($this->db->f(0) != 1) ? "[FAIL]\tRoot node's left index is not 1." : "[OK]\tRoot node's left index is 1.";
00404 
00405         $this->db->query("" . 
00406             "SELECT " . 
00407                 "COUNT(*) FROM `".$this->table."` s " . 
00408             "WHERE " . 
00409                 "`".$this->fields["parent_id"]."` != 0 AND " . 
00410                 "(SELECT COUNT(*) FROM `".$this->table."` WHERE `".$this->fields["id"]."` = s.`".$this->fields["parent_id"]."`) = 0 ");
00411         $this->db->nextr();
00412         $report[] = ($this->db->f(0) > 0) ? "[FAIL]\tMissing parents." : "[OK]\tNo missing parents.";
00413 
00414         $this->db->query("SELECT MAX(`".$this->fields["right"]."`) FROM `".$this->table."`");
00415         $this->db->nextr();
00416         $n = $this->db->f(0);
00417         $this->db->query("SELECT COUNT(*) FROM `".$this->table."`");
00418         $this->db->nextr();
00419         $c = $this->db->f(0);
00420         $report[] = ($n/2 != $c) ? "[FAIL]\tRight index does not match node count." : "[OK]\tRight index matches count.";
00421 
00422         $this->db->query("" . 
00423             "SELECT COUNT(`".$this->fields["id"]."`) FROM `".$this->table."` s " . 
00424             "WHERE " . 
00425                 "(SELECT COUNT(*) FROM `".$this->table."` WHERE " . 
00426                     "`".$this->fields["right"]."` < s.`".$this->fields["right"]."` AND " . 
00427                     "`".$this->fields["left"]."` > s.`".$this->fields["left"]."` AND " . 
00428                     "`".$this->fields["level"]."` = s.`".$this->fields["level"]."` + 1" . 
00429                 ") != " .
00430                 "(SELECT COUNT(*) FROM `".$this->table."` WHERE " . 
00431                     "`".$this->fields["parent_id"]."` = s.`".$this->fields["id"]."`" . 
00432                 ") "
00433             );
00434         $this->db->nextr();
00435         $report[] = ($this->db->f(0) > 0) ? "[FAIL]\tAdjacency and nested set do not match." : "[OK]\tNS and AJ match";
00436 
00437         return implode("<br />",$report);
00438     }

00440     function _dump($output = false) {
00441         $nodes = array();
00442         $this->db->query("SELECT * FROM ".$this->table." ORDER BY `".$this->fields["left"]."`");
00443         while($this->db->nextr()) $nodes[] = $this->db->get_row("assoc");
00444         if($output) {
00445             echo "<pre>";
00446             foreach($nodes as $node) {
00447                 echo str_repeat("&#160;",(int)$node[$this->fields["level"]] * 2);
00448                 echo $node[$this->fields["id"]]." (".$node[$this->fields["left"]].",".$node[$this->fields["right"]].",".$node[$this->fields["level"]].",".$node[$this->fields["parent_id"]].",".$node[$this->fields["position"]].")<br />";
00449             }
00450             echo str_repeat("-",40);
00451             echo "</pre>";
00452         }
00453         return $nodes;
00454     }
00455     function _drop() {
00456         $this->db->query("TRUNCATE TABLE `".$this->table."`");
00457         $this->db->query("" . 
00458                 "INSERT INTO `".$this->table."` (" . 
00459                     "`".$this->fields["id"]."`, " . 
00460                     "`".$this->fields["parent_id"]."`, " . 
00461                     "`".$this->fields["position"]."`, " . 
00462                     "`".$this->fields["left"]."`, " . 
00463                     "`".$this->fields["right"]."`, " . 
00464                     "`".$this->fields["level"]."` " . 
00465                     ") " . 
00466                 "VALUES (" . 
00467                     "1, " . 
00468                     "0, " . 
00469                     "0, " . 
00470                     "1, " . 
00471                     "2, " . 
00472                     "0 ". 
00473                 ")");
00474     }
00475 }
00476 
00477 class json_tree extends _tree_struct { 
00478     function __construct($table = "tree", $fields = array(), $add_fields = array("title" => "title", "type" => "type")) {
00479         parent::__construct($table, $fields);
00480         $this->fields = array_merge($this->fields, $add_fields);
00481         $this->add_fields = $add_fields;
00482     }
00483 
00484     function create_node($data) {
00485         $id = parent::_create((int)$data[$this->fields["id"]], (int)$data[$this->fields["position"]]);
00486         if($id) {
00487             $data["id"] = $id;
00488             $this->set_data($data);
00489             return  "{ \"status\" : 1, \"id\" : ".(int)$id." }";
00490         }
00491         return "{ \"status\" : 0 }";
00492     }
00493     function set_data($data) {
00494         if(count($this->add_fields) == 0) { return "{ \"status\" : 1 }"; }
00495         $s = "UPDATE `".$this->table."` SET `".$this->fields["id"]."` = `".$this->fields["id"]."` "; 
00496         foreach($this->add_fields as $k => $v) {
00497             if(isset($data[$k]))    $s .= ", `".$this->fields[$v]."` = \"".$this->db->escape($data[$k])."\" ";
00498             else                    $s .= ", `".$this->fields[$v]."` = `".$this->fields[$v]."` ";
00499         }
00500         $s .= "WHERE `".$this->fields["id"]."` = ".(int)$data["id"];
00501         $this->db->query($s);
00502         return "{ \"status\" : 1 }";
00503     }
00504     function rename_node($data) { return $this->set_data($data); }
00505 
00506     function move_node($data) { 
00507         $id = parent::_move((int)$data["id"], (int)$data["ref"], (int)$data["position"], (int)$data["copy"]);
00508         if(!$id) return "{ \"status\" : 0 }";
00509         if((int)$data["copy"] && count($this->add_fields)) {
00510             $ids    = array_keys($this->_get_children($id, true));
00511             $data   = $this->_get_children((int)$data["id"], true);
00512 
00513             $i = 0;
00514             foreach($data as $dk => $dv) {
00515                 $s = "UPDATE `".$this->table."` SET `".$this->fields["id"]."` = `".$this->fields["id"]."` "; 
00516                 foreach($this->add_fields as $k => $v) {
00517                     if(isset($dv[$k]))  $s .= ", `".$this->fields[$v]."` = \"".$this->db->escape($dv[$k])."\" ";
00518                     else                $s .= ", `".$this->fields[$v]."` = `".$this->fields[$v]."` ";
00519                 }
00520                 $s .= "WHERE `".$this->fields["id"]."` = ".$ids[$i];
00521                 $this->db->query($s);
00522                 $i++;
00523             }
00524         }
00525         return "{ \"status\" : 1, \"id\" : ".$id." }";
00526     }
00527     function remove_node($data) {
00528         $id = parent::_remove((int)$data["id"]);
00529         return "{ \"status\" : 1 }";
00530     }
00531     function get_children($data) {
00532         $tmp = $this->_get_children((int)$data["id"]);
00533         if((int)$data["id"] === 1 && count($tmp) === 0) {
00534             $this->_create_default();
00535             $tmp = $this->_get_children((int)$data["id"]);
00536         }
00537         $result = array();
00538         if((int)$data["id"] === 0) return json_encode($result);
00539         foreach($tmp as $k => $v) {
00540             $result[] = array(
00541                 "attr" => array("id" => "node_".$k, "rel" => $v[$this->fields["type"]]),
00542                 "data" => $v[$this->fields["title"]],
00543                 "state" => ((int)$v[$this->fields["right"]] - (int)$v[$this->fields["left"]] > 1) ? "closed" : ""
00544             );
00545         }
00546         return json_encode($result);
00547     }
00548     function search($data) {
00549         $this->db->query("SELECT `".$this->fields["left"]."`, `".$this->fields["right"]."` FROM `".$this->table."` WHERE `".$this->fields["title"]."` LIKE '%".$this->db->escape($data["search_str"])."%'");
00550         if($this->db->nf() === 0) return "[]";
00551         $q = "SELECT DISTINCT `".$this->fields["id"]."` FROM `".$this->table."` WHERE 0 ";
00552         while($this->db->nextr()) {
00553             $q .= " OR (`".$this->fields["left"]."` < ".(int)$this->db->f(0)." AND `".$this->fields["right"]."` > ".(int)$this->db->f(1).") ";
00554         }
00555         $result = array();
00556         $this->db->query($q);
00557         while($this->db->nextr()) { $result[] = "#node_".$this->db->f(0); }
00558         return json_encode($result);
00559     }
00560 
00561     function _create_default() {
00562         $this->_drop();
00563         $this->create_node(array(
00564             "id" => 1,
00565             "position" => 0,
00566             "title" => "C:",
00567             "type" => "drive"
00568         ));
00569         $this->create_node(array(
00570             "id" => 1,
00571             "position" => 1,
00572             "title" => "D:",
00573             "type" => "drive"
00574         ));
00575         $this->create_node(array(
00576             "id" => 2,
00577             "position" => 0,
00578             "title" => "_demo",
00579             "type" => "folder"
00580         ));
00581         $this->create_node(array(
00582             "id" => 2,
00583             "position" => 1,
00584             "title" => "_docs",
00585             "type" => "folder"
00586         ));
00587         $this->create_node(array(
00588             "id" => 4,
00589             "position" => 0,
00590             "title" => "index.html",
00591             "type" => "default"
00592         ));
00593         $this->create_node(array(
00594             "id" => 5,
00595             "position" => 1,
00596             "title" => "doc.html",
00597             "type" => "default"
00598         ));
00599     }
